name: qa_clicksign
description: Projeto de automacao E2E (Cypress+Cucumber), API (Postman/Newman) e Carga (k6) com CI/CD

scripts.e2e:smoke: cypress run --browser chrome --env TAGS='@smoke and not @wip'
scripts.e2e:regressao: cypress run --browser chrome --env TAGS='@regressao and not @wip'
scripts.api:run: npx newman run postman/jsonplaceholder.collection.json -e postman/jsonplaceholder.env.json -r cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/newman/report.html
